page.title: 19Woodlesford's Community P.C.
page.content: Theresa Igoe is a community police woman.She goes to work at 8-0-clock and calls into the station to see if there are any notes for her,she walks around Woodlesford,Oulton and John-o-Gaunts to see if there are people doing things they shouldn't be doing. Theresa can choose her own shifts.She has been in the policeforce five and a half years.Before she came to be a police lady she had to do a course.She deals with glue sniffers,hedgehoppers and people who make a lot of noise.Gluesniffers are her hardest problem at the moment.She goes to their houses and talks to them to see if she can stop them from glue sniffing.A lot of them go to John-o-Gaunts subway and sniff glue there.
